search_queries.name: General Construction Machinery
search_queries.query: TTL/(construction AND (machinery OR equipment OR machine))
search_queries.description: Patents with construction machinery/equipment in title

search_queries.name: Excavators and Earthmoving
search_queries.query: TTL/(excavator OR bulldozer OR loader OR backhoe OR "earth moving")

search_queries.name: Cranes and Lifting
search_queries.query: TTL/(crane OR "lifting equipment" OR hoist) AND TTL/construction

search_queries.name: Road Construction Equipment
search_queries.query: TTL/(paver OR compactor OR "road construction" OR "asphalt")

search_queries.name: Concrete Equipment
search_queries.query: TTL/(("concrete mixer" OR "concrete pump" OR "concrete truck") AND construction)

search_queries.name: Construction Robotics
search_queries.query: TTL/(robot AND construction) OR TTL/("construction robot" OR "automated construction")

classification_codes.E01C: Construction of Roads, Railways, or Airports
